Majelis Hakim Vonis Bebas Mantan Dirut PLN Sofyan Basir
04 Nov 2019, 12:54 by Eko Sulestyono


Majelis Hakim Vonis Bebas Mantan Dirut PLN Sofyan Basir

KBRN, Jakarta : Majelis Hakim Pemgadilan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor) Jakarta hari ini telah memvonis bebas mantan Direktur PLN Sofyan Basir. Ketua Majelis Hakim Hariono yang memimpin jalannya persidangan memerintahkan agar Sofyan segera dikeluarkan dari rumah tahanan (Rutan)Â 
"Memerintahkan kepeda jaksa untuk mengeluarkan terdakwa dari tahanan," kata hakim ketua Hariono saat membacakan amar putusan dalam sidang di Pengadilan Tipikor Jakarta, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Kemayoran, Jakarta Pusat, Senin (4/11/2019).
Majelis hakim memutuskan bahwa Sofyan Basir dinyatakan tidak bersalah melanggar Pasal 12 huruf a juncto Pasal 15 Undang-Undang (UU) Pemberantasan Tipikor juncto Pasal 56 Ke-2 KUHP dan Pasal 11 juncto Pasal 15 UU Pemberantasan Tipikor juncto Pasal 56 ke-2 KUHP.
Majelis hakim menilai bahwa Sofyan Basir tidak terbukti memfasilitasi pemberian suap dari pengusaha Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo kepada mantan Anggota DPR RI Eni Maulani Saragih dan mantan Menteri Sosial (Mensos) Idrus Marham.
Sebelumnya Sofyan Basir didakwa telah memberikan suap itu berkaitan dengan proses kesepakatan proyek pembangunan Pembangkit Listrik Tenaga Uap (PLTU).
Proyek yang dimaksud adalah terkait pembangunan ndependent Power Producer Pembangkit Listrik Tenaga Uap Mulut Tambang (IPP PLTU MT) Riau-1 antara PT Pembangkitan Jawa Bali Investasi (PJBI) dan Blackgold Natural Resources (BNR) Ltd dan China Huadian Engineering Company Limited (CHEC) Ltd.

Panel of Judges Free Ex-Ex Managing Director of PLN Sofyan Basir
04 Nov 2019, 12:54 by Eko Sulestyono


Panel of Judges Free Ex-Ex Managing Director of PLN Sofyan Basir

KBRN, Jakarta: The Jakarta Corruption Court Judge Council (Tipikor) today has acquitted former PLN Director Sofyan Basir. Chairman of the Panel of Judges Hariono who presided over the proceedings ordered that Sofyan be immediately removed from the detention center (detention center)
"Ordered the prosecutor to remove the defendant from detention," said chief judge Hariono when reading the verdict in a trial at the Jakarta Corruption Court, Jalan Bungur Besar Raya, Kemayoran, Central Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
The panel of judges ruled that Sofyan Basir was found not guilty of violating Article 12 letter a juncto Article 15 of the Law on the Elimination of Corruption in conjunction with Article 56 of the Second Criminal Code and Article 11 in conjunction with Article 15 of the Law on the Eradication of Corruption in conjunction with Article 56 of the Criminal Code.
The panel of judges considered that Sofyan Basir was not proven to facilitate the giving of bribes from businessman Johanes Budisutrisno Kotjo to former DPR RI Eni Maulani Saragih and former Social Minister (Social Minister) Idrus Marham.
Previously Sofyan Basir was charged with giving bribes relating to the project agreement process for the construction of a Steam Power Plant (PLTU).
The project in question is related to the construction of independent Power Producers of the Mine-Mouth Steam Power Plant (IPP PLTU MT) Riau-1 between PT Generating Java Bali Investment (PJBI) and Blackgold Natural Resources (BNR) Ltd. and China Huadian Engineering Company Limited (CHEC) Ltd. .
